appDesc.description: Automatically browse data of over 6,000+ institutions across the country, including the eight Ivy League Schools, the ten UC campuses, the ten Claremont Colleges, and the twenty-three CSU's. Have access to the latest information, such as FAFSA, in-state and out-of-state tuition, application requirements, standardized test percentile scores, urbanization, college type, and so much more, all in once place. View information that might have a lasting affect on your decision and application, such as the college's mission statement. Get real-time breakdowns for SAT/ACT scores and admission requirements. Want to save the amount of time spent on finding data on your dream school? Just wait til you try College Manager.
